name: resume
description: My resume built with JSONResume schema

scripts.build-html: mkdir -p dist/web && resumed render src/resume.json -o dist/web/index.html -t $THEME
scripts.build-web: pnpm run build-html && pnpm run minify
scripts.build-pdf: pnpm run build-web && pnpm run create-pdf

author: Tobias Stadler
